TopicTitle: Solar System add-on that has a kerbin like planet for end-game colonization?

Articles.Content: Does anyone know if there is a solar System add-on that has a kerbin like planet for end-game colonization?
Strictly speaking wouldn't that be Laythe? Aside from not being breathable, it is pretty similar to Kerbin. Aside from being mostly water.
Laythe might be able to be "terraformed" in theory, I suppose. I wish there was a terraforming mod.

> 
> Linked for the lazy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Doesn't seem to really be an end game kind of place to colonize, not at least like I meant it. I'm looking for literally a kerbin twin.
